mcq.statement: From whom did Maharajah Ranjit Singh capture the Koh-i-Noor Diamond, leading to the construction of Hazuri Bagh?
mcq.one_liner: Maharajah Ranjit Singh captured the Koh-i-Noor Diamond from **Shah Shujah of Afghanistan**, which led to the building of Hazuri Bagh.
